targets.query: select last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /$logger_m$/)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(usage_user) as "user", mean(usage_system) as "system", mean(usage_softirq) as "softirq", mean(usage_steal) as "steal", mean(usage_nice) as "nice", mean(usage_irq) as "irq", mean(usage_iowait) as "iowait", mean(usage_guest) as "guest", mean(usage_guest_nice) as "guest_nice"  FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ and cpu = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT ( MEAN(load1) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_1, ( MEAN(load5) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_5, ( MEAN(load15) / [[n_cpus]] ) as load_15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s) * count("bytes_recv") / count("bytes_recv") * 8 as "Inbound"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s) * count("bytes_sent") / count("bytes_sent") * 8 as "Outbound" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/ AND interface =~ /$nic/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "path" fill(none)
SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "path" =~ /^$mountpoint$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "host", "path"
SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean(usage_system) + mean(usage_iowait) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "cpu" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(reads),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(writes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_bytes),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_bytes),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(read_time),1s) as "read" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(write_time),1s) as "write" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /$logger_m$/ AND "name" =~ /$disks$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), *
SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "EPS" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("EPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "Total Events" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total Events" FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") as "Total EPS" FROM (SELECT last("BPS_SLC") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter), Receiver_Type fill(none)
SELECT LAST("ChunkID_Count") AS "Indexing WOS Lag" FROM "exec_Logger_PostgreSQL" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)
SELECT last("EPS_SLC") as "EPS" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "Processor_Type" fill(none)
SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "Total Events" FROM "Logger_Receivers" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), * fill(none)

SELECT SUM("pointer") FROM (SELECT LAST("Total_Events") AS "pointer" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), * fill(none)) GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT last("BPS_SLC") as "Bytes/sec" FROM "Logger_Processors" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter), "Processor_Type" fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/APS.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT last("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "SNMP" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/snmp.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_usage") / [[n_cpus]] AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '/opt/data/mysql_data/Localhost_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/APS.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "SNMP" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/snmp.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("num_threads") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '/opt/data/mysql_data/Localhost_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean(total) FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReceivers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/APS.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("memory_rss") AS "SNMP" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/snmp.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("memory_usage") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '/opt/data/mysql_data/Localhost_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none) ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Receivers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger WEB" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerWeb.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Servers" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerServers.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Processors" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerProcessors.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Logger Report Engine" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/logger/run/LoggerReportEngine.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "Apache" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/userdata/logs/apache/httpd.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "APS" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/APS.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)
SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "SNMP" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "pidfile" = '/opt/arcsight/aps/run/snmp.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

SELECT mean("cpu_time_iowait") AS "MySQL" FROM "procstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$logger_m$/ AND "process_name" = 'mysqld' AND "pidfile" = '/opt/data/mysql_data/Localhost_server.pid') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($inter) fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"
list.label: Logger
list.name: logger_m
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/
list.label: Disks
list.name: disks
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "diskio" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/
list.label: Mountpoint
list.name: mountpoint
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "disk" WITH KEY = "path" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/
list.label: NIC
list.name: nic
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$logger_m$/
